website_summaries.verdict: At around $60 online, the decently performing and well-designed Logitech X300 is a relative bargain in the mini Bluetooth speaker category.
pros: The Logitech X300 is a compact wireless Bluetooth speakers that offers decent sound for its size and features an attractive, sturdy design at a modest price point
It has a built-in microphone for speakerphone calls and can be laid down horizontally or stood up vertically

customer_reviews.title: Don't overthink this.
customer_reviews.text: Any review over more than a full paragraph on this product is just over thinking the subject. Simply put, at this price point, this is a most excellent speaker. VERY good sound. 4-5 hours is reasonable battery length (portable batteries are cheap now, folks, so you can easily double the battery life). You can charge it the same way you charge your phone. Bluetooth works fine for a very reasonable distance. Solidly built and a pleasing design, you cannot go wrong. Add to that the Logitech reputation for quality products, and there you have it. Now, go buy one.
customer_reviews.author: nocknock@pacbell.net

customer_reviews.title: and I LOVE it. The sound is amazing for it's size
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Logitech speaker unit. I bought a purefi unit in 2008 and it lasted for about 5 years before the battery stopped holding the advertised 7 hour charge. Still usable until the top buttons started cracking and it stopped working. So I bought this one, and I LOVE it. The sound is amazing for it's size. It feels solid and belongs on the table almost as if it's a conversation piece. I rarely recommend anything, but this product has no flaws. Bluetooth range is impressive as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Rozenberg

customer_reviews.title: Tiniest Speakers In My House
customer_reviews.text: Tiny little "basic sound quality" speaker. Works as expected. Modestly! Should be just okay for playing tunes while working. Looks durable. Instructions are vague at best. Just line drawings. How will I know when the batteries are charged? I wonder.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Manuel Mena Garza

customer_reviews.title: meh...It auto-offs, and that cant' be disabled
customer_reviews.text: Sound is what you'd expect for $20. The deal killer for me is the auto-off event, even when USB connected. After looking around, it seems all the cheap Chinese ones are that way. To get a controllable auto-off toggle, you have to go Sony/Samsung/Bose or something much more expensive. Wish I knew that beforehand.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen P. Wille

customer_reviews.title: Mind of it's own
customer_reviews.text: I really like the sound of this speaker. It feels solid. The big problem is that it turns on 2-3 times a day by it's self!! I've stopped turning it of and letting it go off with the feature that it has of inactivity. I've email Logitech but its been 4 days and NOTHING. I will keep it cause I do like the sound but I wish there was better customer service at Logitech. After a couple weeks Logitech came through! Sent me a brand new speaker! WAY TOGO LOGITECH
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Good Sound, Portable Speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Love this speaker! Fills up an entire room! I use it regularly in the shower and also when I want to go outside/perform with my hula hoop in my living room. It has good, filling, clear, quality “booming” sound. Doesn’t take long to charge. Was easy to set up. No static. Love the rose gold/black features of it; makes it very sleek. The reason I found it was because members were using it in the lobby of my senior recreation facility and I was trying figure out what such a loud noise was, and then took a picture of it and found it on the internet. It’s really great! No complaints on my end. In love!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Years+
customer_reviews.text: This thing just keeps going. I've dropped it, used it in the bathroom, used it while working in the garage, etc.. It has excellent battery life even after being used A LOT over five years. Sound quality is very good for the size. Usually connects right up to my phone with no problems. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: myJimpants

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: I own quite a few speakers, Bose, Jbl and Yamaha. I’ve owned Logitech speakers before and been very happy with them. I’ve seen the reviews and some seemed picky. The sound on this speaker is quite good along with the volume. Feels well built and the power button on the back isn’t a problem. The only problem I have is it’s not able to be paired with multiple speakers. Overall I would say this is a good speaker at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: kirk litkowiec

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers. Unique style. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for use on a job site after having had my personal one for the last 4yrs. Love the buttons, love the style & colos (I just received the rose red, my other one is orange/bronze), and the sound works well for music & movies. I'm no audiophile but the deep tones & high notes are balanced and clear. It's lightweight and retains a decent charge so I can take it with me anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I had higher expectations for this product after buying a Logitech docking station a few years back for my daughter which I thought was a fantastic product with unbelievable sound. I have intermittent connectivity issues even when the speaker is in close proximity to my laptop. Overall sound is bottom/bass heavy and one dimensional. For the price it's not bad, but there are much better products out there.
customer_reviews.author: A.E. Pagano

customer_reviews.title: Just okay.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker to use when traveling. It pairs nicely and is super convenient and small. But! The charging cord is super short which is annoying because you have it right next to an outlet while charging. And the charging port (like someone else mentioned) is very fragile. I haven't had mine a full year and the charger will no longer work with the speaker. Waste of money imo.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't live up to the Logi Brand
customer_reviews.text: If I was Logitech, I'd remove this model from stores. The sound quality wasn't all that great. It's def. cheap, so if you just want a stereo-mono-like noise on the side, this will work. Otherwise, go for another brand and spend a little more for that bass.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Apollo

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is good, some problems with the mic
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is very good product, and excellent build quality (as expected from Logitech). There is one minor problem, if you plan to use it for phone calls it is not recommend. Microphone is not working properly, it seems that when the other side is speaking the microphone mutes it self to reduce noise, which forces a sort of "walkie talkie" way of speaking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery problem
customer_reviews.text: I have had this speaker for two years. It suddenly stopped working. It no longer takes a charge. I called customer support and they confirmed that it is indeed a throwaway when the battery no longer takes a charge. I used the speaker for approximately an hour a day for four days a week. While the sound is adequate for a good size room, you may want to consider the fact that when it stops taking a charge, you'll have to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma2-10

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, odd shape, sub-standard adapter
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker has really good sound volume and quality; however, battery life is poor and the adapter no longer charges. The cable is beginning to break from the connectors (no, I haven't helped it along) - this one month outside return date.
customer_reviews.author: kwgphx

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this little guy. He's small but sounds great, and he connects to my phone via Bluetooth extremely quickly, which I'm thrilled about. It also seems to have some sort of timer where it shuts itself off if it's not in use, which I also appreciate. You don't know if it's running out of battery, that I can tell, but that doesn't seem to be a huge problem for me so far.
customer_reviews.author: brooklynfan

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good audio
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good audio quality. I was very pleased while listening to various music, including hardcore/metal. A little light on bass perhaps but that's to be expected with speakers this small. Sturdy, could definitely be tossed around traveling without worrying too much. Pretty good battery life, though I haven't tested it beyond 3 hours or so, but it handled that fine at high volume. I might make the power button a little easier to reach, it's sort of hidden on the back side but a little too well IMO. Also wouldn't mind a light or something to help indicate the volume it's set at
customer_reviews.author: William E Vice

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: This is a little over priced for the sound quality. It would be better priced in the $25 range. The bass is a little strange - kind of plucky (for lack of a technical term:) and there's slight buzz on lower tones but it's not too bad. Good middle, ok highs and it's nice and sturdy. Considering returning.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Great if you play loud; not so much if you play soft
customer_reviews.text: The sound on this small speaker is quite good. If you are looking for a small speaker that can put out a lot of volume, this may be a good choice. But when I work I want the music on quite low and I found the dynamic controls of this speaker were not good enough for my needs. The lowest volume possible was still too loud for me.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: Good Device
customer_reviews.text: Great little speakers. Only problem is if the speaker isn't used for a few minutes it shuts down - even when connected to a power source - so I end up having to restart them very frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker. The sound quality is great for such a small speaker. I have taken this thing on many vacations, dropped, smashed and it’s still going strong. The exterior is a nice soft touch material. Also, you can listen to music while you are charging it. Some people have mentioned limited battery life. I have a travel battery I carry with me, cost 25 bucks, plug that in and you could listen to music for days. This thing is so awesome my mom stole it.
customer_reviews.author: Night Beast

customer_reviews.title: Power coupling failed after 10 months = paperweight
customer_reviews.text: Actually really liked it, though I did have trouble finding the power button. Sound good, battery life good enough. BUT wtf is up with plugging it in to recharge - that little plugin port has a broken connection or something and now it will not recharge, so it is no more than an expensive and not-too-attractive paperweight now.
customer_reviews.author: Sully

customer_reviews.title: Fine speaker at a good price, but let's be realistic
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine little speaker for a reasonable amount of money. It's a big step up from your phone or whatever you are connecting to it and that's really the point. What I don't understand is all the reviews around the web about how 'great' the sound is. Somewhere during the transition from vinyl to CDs to MP3, etc. the bar for what is great sound got lowered to a point where anything that doesn't sound tinny is praised to the skies. Ok, that's my two cents, end of rant.
customer_reviews.author: GaryBerger

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design + Surprising Sound
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good sound and fast bluetooth connectivity. The black and copper is a steal. If you need a bluetooth speaker with speakerphone capabilities, this is a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Lagniappe

customer_reviews.title: The best portable speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I love these speakers! I received one as a gift and loved it so much I bought another for myself and one for my father! The sound is crisp and clear and the bass is fantastic. This speaker is LOUD. We have used it outside for parties and it worked great. BUY THIS YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kstew425

customer_reviews.title: gets better as you crank up the volume
customer_reviews.text: Can be really loud. for the price and the size, you are getting a lot out of it. treble is not as clear comparing to Bose or Marshall, gets better as you crank up the volume. Obviously comparing this to Bose or Marshall is crazy, but I have not tried JBL or other bluetooth speakers. (if you are a Beats person than its another story lol)
customer_reviews.author: Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in Logitech
customer_reviews.text: Just received my Logitech x300 speaker...I'm very disappointed. First, it has several scratches on top which leads me to believe that this item was a returned item. Not starting out very well. Second, I pressed the power button and it would not turn on for many tries. About 25 minutes later, it turns on but a light continues to blink. For this price range, I expect a new product and I expect it to function phone properly. I'll return it immediately. I don't understand why Amazon continues to allow items like this to be sold. I will not recommend Logitech products like I always have.
customer_reviews.author: Fanfarious

customer_reviews.title: The Quality and Value Far Exceed the Price
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this purchase. The unit is compact, solidly built, great grip and feel for carrying, and most important gets a substantial and quality sound from it's four speakers. The picture only setup instructions leave a little to be desired, such as when you want to add a second device to it and need to get into bluetooth pairing mode, but additional instructions can be found online. To me, the quality and value of this unit far exceed the price. Highly recommend this choice.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell G. Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great sound in a tiny box
customer_reviews.text: Love this speaker. Such great sound from such a tiny box! It’s a great color as well. It paired easily and was up and ready to rock in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Kcdreams

customer_reviews.title: I love this little speaker for bedside use
customer_reviews.text: I love this little speaker for bedside use. It is great for white noise/sound therapy. The sound is much richer, fuller, and louder than my phone. It lasts all night. The only complaints are the dings/beeps when the device is powered on/off & the device didn't ship with a charging cable. The dings/beeps can be annoying and wake you up if a timer is set to turn off the sounds. I use the micro-usb cable from my phone to charge during the day. Otherwise, I'm very happy with the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Geetha

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: If the documentation had been better, I'd have given this a 5 star rating. It is lacking in documentation for setting up Bluetooth, battery charge time and battery care. Performance is very good, nice tone and good volume control.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: No Bass
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for my Oontz, by Cambridge. IT's charging port got tweaked amd figured I'd upgrade this time. Nope. Oontz is better.
customer_reviews.author: Vader

customer_reviews.title: It's A Brick
customer_reviews.text: This stopped working after a month. The battery lasts maybe 90 minutes after charging all night. The unit will not play even when plugged in. I would return it but the problem appeared the day after the return window closed. It's ridiculous I cannot return something this defective. I'll buy electronics from New Egg next time. Bad work, Logitech.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Agress

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality in portable bluetooth speaker. Good bass, unlike so many tinny sounding small speakers. Excellent price point.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Tiny but Mighty
customer_reviews.text: Great quality speaker for the size and price. Had this for a number of years now and its still going strong. Very loud.
customer_reviews.author: Rashidah

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, nice for travel
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, nice for travel. Works well with my phone, but the software/connection is a bit buggy with my computer and takes a bit too long to connect. However, it is super quick and easy to connect with my phone, so this speaker most likely has no issues and it is something going on with my computer. Really fun for listening to music, movies, and games from multiple devices.
customer_reviews.author: warblerbg

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker - still using 5 years later
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these speakers and wow are they great quality. Not just for the price but also for the sound. Tiny speaker with lots of oomph. I use one one the boat and apthought it's not water resistant it has still held up incredibly. Would 100% recommend
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker is great. It has exceeded my expectations. It is strong and loud enough for small out door activities. In doors It is loud enough to fill a decent size room. Bluetooth reception is pretty good with my Galaxy S5 as I can go about 15-20 feet without interruption. I will say If you get a decent gust of wind it will disrupt the connection at that distance. I have taken this to the beach, work out room, pool etc... with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: JJV

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to pack, BT pairs easily and stays connected. Sound quality great for $30. My first X300 lasted 4 or 5 years before battery failure.
customer_reviews.author: DeeGee

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this speaker. It fits in my pocket so I can carry it around the house. I can use it with my iPhone to make audiobooks and music sound great, and sound loud enough that I can move around a room, or even into another room, and hear the book/music. I can also hardwire it to my laptop so I can hear TV shows etc. in stereo. And I can use it to amplify the iPhone speaker on phone calls, a godsend when my husband and I are both participating on a phone call.
customer_reviews.author: LizP

customer_reviews.title: Won't Spawn Spontaneous Dance Parties, Thin Sound but Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: Well-built. Good battery life. Smaller than expected. Not as loud as I'd like. At this price point, produces good sound. But don't expect this to fill a room and create spontaneous dance parties.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew L Steinhoff

customer_reviews.title: Been with me through thick and thin
customer_reviews.text: When I first bought this product my freshman year of college, I was looking for a cheap, portable speaker that I could use in my dorm room. 4 years later, this speaker has started impromptu karaoke sessions, climbed mountains with me, and helped me make new friends. And even after all that, the damn thing still works just as well as it did the day I took it out of the box. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Tan

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my father because he likes listening to music in the garage or in his workshop when he works on things. For being so compact this thing puts out a lot of high quality sound and does very well with bass too. I am very pleased with this purchase. The only drawback is that its obviously based on bluetooth capability so when running from his laptop inside sometimes if he takes it in another room the walls mess up the signal.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Not "hi-fi" by any stretch but perfectly adequate. I use it to bypass the tinny sound of my Macbook Air, OK for listening to internet radio or when watching movies on your laptop and small enough to pack in your carry-on. Four stars because it looks meh and the battery change lasts about 4 hours so it seems to always be connected to the USB port. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Freak

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after I had my first fall backwards on the charging port while plugged in and it would no longer charge. I use it to listen to podcasts while I'm cooking, grilling outside or cleaning. I love the sound quality and the durability! That is, providing you don't drop it backwards on the charging cord like a jackass as I did.
customer_reviews.author: ultr4meg4OK

customer_reviews.title: I thought that the compact X300 bluetooth speak probably would not sound as good -- but it sounds better and generates more volu
customer_reviews.text: I have an old PC I use for internet radio when I am working. It has four speakers (small) hooked up to the sound card. I thought that the compact X300 bluetooth speak probably would not sound as good -- but it sounds better and generates more volume!! I bought the speaker to carry with my iPad mini when I travel. To my delight I can use the bluetooth keyboard and the X300 speaker with the iPad at the same time with no hitches or glitches. Who knew!!!????? I like to tilt it up so the sound reflects off the wall. The music sounds better to me that way. This little speaker is a lot of bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.author: Doug Roberts, Author

customer_reviews.title: Dead on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: Opened package, connected the unit for charging and tried turning it on. When turning it on, device wont emit the  ̈pairing ̈ sound and the Bluetooth button doesn't do anything. I have the X100 and expected and it has worked for years. This is the biggest disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest bass
customer_reviews.text: Speakers overall are jot bad, just not impressed with the quality of bass. My bigger speakers that are Logitech, have better bass quality. Kind of disappointed, but it is only a small speaker.
customer_reviews.author: None yea

customer_reviews.title: louder bass notes are artificially silenced resulting in dull lifeless music
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is simply ok. Whoever designed the crossover in this speaker decided to actively mute bass notes to prevent distortion. Thus, louder bass notes are artificially silenced resulting in dull lifeless music. The mid-range and treble notes are clear and precise with very little distortion, but this speaker has a way of removing much of the joy I normally experience from my favorite music. I recommend spending more on a speaker if you value high quality playback from your portable speaker. This is the first time a Wirecutter review has left me feeling disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: David McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Excellent portable speaker
customer_reviews.text: Got this on sale as a gift for my girlfriend. She travels a lot and this has been the perfect little speaker to accompany her Android phone. It connected easily to her phone via Bluetooth and is actually pretty loud for its size. Batteries last at least 6-8 hours between charges, and the speaker will also work while plugged in. We're both really happy about this speaker, and I may be buying one for myself next time it goes on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Speaker is a good all around speaker
customer_reviews.text: Speaker is a good all around speaker. I was hoping for something magical, but really its just a good quality speaker with good battery and good sound. I am still looking for something that come in a small size like this, but can pump out some bass! Maybe it just does not exist yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: I don't know why people love this thing so much
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why people love this thing so much. Maybe it's just me, but man...the sound is awful. I get that it's little and should be used in situations that call for "little sound" but my goodness...you can't hear anything. Even my goofy, lo-fi, dirty and badly produced punk rock sounds WORSE. Plus, when I received it, something was rattling around inside. I thought maybe it was a defect and returned it and tested it at a store. Same thing. Blech. I gave it two stars because I do understand that in certain situations it may be good for some people.
customer_reviews.author: DarbyCrash1978

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Speaker! I have only used it with my ...
customer_reviews.text: GREAT Speaker! I have only used it with my desk-top computer, Its little, cute, and best of all you can take it anywhere. Great sound.
customer_reviews.author: E. E.

customer_reviews.title: VERY annoying. If I pause playback
customer_reviews.text: Decent sound, but I'm having the problem that it keeps disconnecting itself from my computer. VERY annoying. If I pause playback, when I hit play again, I've lost the speaker connection. If my computer logs off, I've lost the speaker connection. If I breathe wrong, I've lost the speaker connection. When I try to get connection back, I get "Error connecting to headset. Please retry this operation." over and over again. I have to do a total computer and speaker shut down to get them talking again. Maddening!
customer_reviews.author: L. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son wanted this speaker (he broke the last one he had) he loves it. Great sound, not muffled at all. Easy to use. Pretty color. Would order again.
customer_reviews.author: GINA M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is awesome. Great sound and a great price. It's also not overly heavy so I don't mind carrying the thing around. I have other bluetooth speakers that sometimes connect and sometimes not. This thing never fails to connect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but no state-of-charge info
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific product at a great price, I love it except for one thing. I cannot tell how much charge is left, so I have to charge it very often whether it needs it or not. I always fear it will go dead in the middle of use without warning.
customer_reviews.author: don Hellerius

customer_reviews.title: Nice speaker for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a good speaker for the price - bluetooth works fine
customer_reviews.author: Savica

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use it by my recliner to listen to my tv since have problem hearing it without volume turned up so loud. So far works great
customer_reviews.author: Ronp

customer_reviews.title: Take your tunes with you
customer_reviews.text: Nice speaker for anywhere in or outside house. This was my present as I never had a blue tooth speaker. It always disappears because someone takes to use in areas around the house. This is despite the fact other people have their own speakers!! Good sound.
customer_reviews.author: K. Pena

customer_reviews.title: I am not disappoint at my purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Bluetooth Stereo Speaker. After reviewing, checking price, i try to buy this speaker. I am not disappoint at my purchase. It excellent from sound point of view, portablity and price. I one thing that i don't like is the volume, its not too high. If using it inside bedroom with full vol. and close the door, you can not hear it outside the door but inside the room its enough. Bass is limited, but their is no distortion of sound, which i noticed in One of Bose speakers. For me its good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Pama

customer_reviews.title: A great spekaer for those who don't want to break the bank.
customer_reviews.text: A very good speaker for it's price. The bass isn't very heavy, but everything else sounds great! Ive never had the battery run out on me, but I usually don't use it for long periods of time. I would recommend this speaker for those who want to reach the middle ground of affordability and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Talon

customer_reviews.title: Suits my portable needs.
customer_reviews.text: 2nd one ,I’ve purchased. 1st last 5+ years before it would no longer charge. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good with phone.
customer_reviews.text: The Logitech Bluetooth speaker sound is very good. It works great with my IPhone. However, the connectivity with my laptop is very inconsistent. It has completely lost the sound during conference calls. I decided to keep it to use with my phone but have ordered different speakers for my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: iT WILL QUIT WORKING SOON AFTER USING AND KEEP SHUTTING OFF IVE HAD TWO BOTH SAME THING
customer_reviews.author: KING DAN

customer_reviews.title: Blue Tooth Speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. The first one lasted 10 years and was only replaced when the charger port broke.
customer_reviews.author: Mountaintruck1

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I use it for my yoga class. Easy to use
customer_reviews.author: V Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound at moderate levels
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Bluetooth speaker because our family now has a number of tablets and smartphones, and I was getting tired of hearing pre-teen and teen pop music being played on tiny speakers in those devices. I also didn't want to spend $200 for a Bluetooth speaker, so for about $75 this is a great value. This is now our "family" speaker for the kids (and for my wife and me) to listen to music. I've never cranked it up more than about 1/2 way, but even at medium levels it fills the room with sound. The sound is rich, with enough bass for our tastes Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Howard D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sound amplifier for Apple devices with NO wires!
customer_reviews.text: Some videos on the Internet are almost inaudible. In 2 minutes, this device will pair up with an Apple iPad or iPhone and play the sound so loud, you can't hear planes land. It is easy to use - just turn on and adjust the volume - it is wireless. It was easy to recharge with the included USB cable. Great product, phenomenal price!
customer_reviews.author: William Teal

customer_reviews.title: Good, but outdated.
customer_reviews.text: Update 4-years later after initial purchase: Still easy to use and love the fact that the battery lasts for hours after charging. However, I know that new models exist which put out a better sound. Now that this model is like 3-times less than what I originally paid, it might be a cheap alternative to get what you need.
customer_reviews.author: mattroffact

customer_reviews.title: Very solid, affordable speakers. A bit heavy on ...
customer_reviews.text: Very solid, affordable speakers. A bit heavy on the mids and bass, but nothing too outrageous. Really fills the room and is much more powerful than you'd think for such small speakers. Simple interface and very long battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that I didn't like is the volume leveling. Whenever a song would normally start off quietly, it's as if the speaker decides that it doesn't need to dampen what I'm hearing any more and the sound suddenly comes blaring out. Then the sound will become much softer once the rest of the song kicks in, which is the opposite of what I expect. So far I've used this speaker solely to play music. Aside from what I previously mentioned I've enjoyed using this.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Hall

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great rich sound from this little speaker - I wouldn't expect such bass from such a small package. A single charge lasts for hours and I love being able to move it room to room or take it outside with me. You can even take calls on it - there is a microphone right on the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: This is a great sounding speaker and very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these speakers. They are very easy to hook up to your Bluetooth device. It has exceptional sound and is very clear even at louder volumes. They battery lasts a long time and doesn't take long to recharge. I would recommend this speaker very highly.

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Great!

customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I did my research and this is the best quality speaker for the money. It has as much sound quality as the top Bluetooth speakers. On the loudest setting there is absolutely no sound distortion. The sound this small speaker puts out is clear and powerful easily filling an entire room. I've owned this product for 4 years now!
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Good volume and sound
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a year or more now and it's still going strong. Good volume and sound. Take it disc golfing and use it for jamming out in the morning. Product is a champion.
customer_reviews.author: Deiket Desse

customer_reviews.title: I love this unit
customer_reviews.text: I love this unit. I bought two of them. Great sound, easy to use. Pairs easily with a tablet or a phone. Be aware however - you can only use one at a time within the 30' range. If you pair up the second one, it kicks off the first. But I use one at home and take one to outside events. A great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: portable yet great sounding speakers and came across this one
customer_reviews.text: I did some research on small, portable yet great sounding speakers and came across this one. It really does the job and it is at a great price. It is also easy to set up with any Smart/Bluetooth type of device (iPhone or iPad).
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Real Stereo sound for such a small speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing little speaker! I was not expecting anything close to the great sound that comes out of it. The nice rubber housing makes it perfect for handling without dropping it. The volume works great at full in a 25'x25' area. The Bluetooth sets up in less than a minute. I plan on purchasing a second one.

customer_reviews.text: great sound when it was working! Just over the year mark it stopped holding a charge, and now it's completely dead.

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price. Dislike how it automatically turns off if the audio is overwhelming. Battery lasts a few hours, definitely keep a charger around. Great for a first time portable speaker if you've never owned one. Quality logitech product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Good for Price
customer_reviews.text: This speaker works fairly well. Noise level seems to be either too loud or not loud enough, I have a hard time finding just the right level. Battery lasts a good amount of time before needing to be charged.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Yuhas

customer_reviews.title: Many different uses. Good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great, and I don't have an issue with the battery life. I use this primarily at home and at the office. Best use so far was placing it outside in a Halloween decoration, and playing scary music as kids passed by. It worked reasonably well on the other side of the door. Not great, but well enough to have some fun.
customer_reviews.author: Seahunters

customer_reviews.title: Definately ok, just.

Not as much bass as I thought they should be able to get with new porting technology. Does put out a decent volume.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Great!

It would be nice to have forward and next buttons on it like the older logitech models.

customer_reviews.title: My phone connected with the Logitech X300 very quickly and ...

It's compact, light, but pushes out decent sound for the price. My only wish is that they placed the on-off button on the top instead of back.
